title: Stunning unique elevared beachfront land in Dickwella
details:
This is a new elevated beachfront headland which is bordered with safe swim-able in all around the year,white sand very beautiful beach in Tangalle. Other side is boulder beachfront which offers the stunning sea views. This area is famous for tourism and 90% of this bay area is owned by foreign owned companies. Likewise there are couple of high luxury villas. It is too difficult to find clear deed lands. But this land is having clear deed that was received from court order as partition deed.

If you would need to get more details, please contact info@ srilankarealestateagents .com
